service.description: Convert an image from one type to another. See for reference: https://www.baeldung.com/java-copy-file

parameter.name: outputImageFormat
parameter.description: Supports the values: jpg, png, tiff, webp, bmp, wbmp

parameter.name: outputResourceReferenceOriginal
parameter.description: Destination to save original image with no modification.

parameter.name: outputResourceReferenceLarge
parameter.description: Destination to save the converted image with pixelWidthLarge width.

parameter.name: outputResourceReferenceMedium
parameter.description: Destination to save the converted image with pixelWidthMedium width.

parameter.name: outputResourceReferenceSmall
parameter.description: Destination to save the converted image with pixelWidthSmall width.

parameter.name: outputResourceReferenceThumbnail
parameter.description: Destination to save the converted image with pixelWidthThumbnail width.

parameter.name: contentLocationOriginal
parameter.description: Destination string that was saved with the original image with no modification.

parameter.name: contentLocationLarge
parameter.description: Destination string that was saved with the converted image with pixelWidthLarge width.

parameter.name: contentLocationMedium
parameter.description: Destination string that was saved with the converted image with pixelWidthMedium width.

parameter.name: contentLocationSmall
parameter.description: Destination string that was saved with the converted image with pixelWidthSmall width.

parameter.name: contentLocationThumbnail
parameter.description: Destination string that was saved with the converted image with pixelWidthThumbnail width.

parameter.name: outputImageFormat
parameter.description: Supports the values: jpg, png, tiff, webp, bmp, wbmp
